table_description: This table contains metadata about the slide microscopy (SM) series available in IDC. Each row corresponds to an instance from a DICOM Slide Microscopy series available from IDC, identified by `SOPInstanceUID`, and contains attributes specific to SM series, such as the pixel spacing at the maximum resolution layer, the power of the objective lens used to digitize the slide, and the anatomic location from where the imaged specimen was collected. This table can be joined with the main index table and/or with `sm_index` using the `SeriesInstanceUID` column.

columns.name: embeddingMedium_CodeMeaning
columns.description: embedding medium used for the slide preparation

columns.name: tissueFixative_CodeMeaning
columns.description: tissue fixative used for the slide preparation

columns.name: staining_usingSubstance_CodeMeaning
columns.description: staining substances used for the slide preparation

columns.name: PixelSpacing_0
columns.description: pixel spacing in mm, rounded to 2 significant figures

columns.name: instance_size
columns.description: size of the instance file in bytes

columns.name: TotalPixelMatrixColumns
columns.description: number of columns in the image

columns.name: TotalPixelMatrixRows
columns.description: number of rows in the image

columns.name: crdc_instance_uuid
columns.description: unique identifier of the instance within the IDC
